name: unauthentic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not real, true, or what people say it is: This piece of software is designed to help academic institutions identify unauthentic material. I confess to adding my own, very unauthentic addition to the recipe: I stir a bunch of chopped kale into the broth. Synonym
inauthenticOpposite
authentic
More examplesFewer examplesCheerfully unauthentic, the Scottish-themed pub is all Robbie Burns' poetry, kilts, and bagpipes.Respondents felt that they were obliged to behave in ways that felt unauthentic in order to be accepted.Many people believe that his behaviour shows genuine commitment and is not simply unauthentic deception.
